name: Sam Nightmare - كابوس سام
description:
Are you looking for a game that gives you the ultimate challenge? Then Sam Nightmare is for you

Sam Nightmare is a 3D topdown shooter game where you need to kill all enemies in the room go to next level, The game starts with 1 enemy on level 1 then when you go to next level the number of enemies is increment by 1, in other words if you reach level 10 you need to face 10 enemies at same time. If you got killed the game will send you back to level 1 to start from scratch.

You can attack your enemies with melee attack and a pistol , the pistol starts with 0 bullets and whenever you kill an enemy you get 1 bullet.
When you got hit, you need to stay 5 seconds without any damage and you will start healing.
Each time you the play a level , enemies location and walk paths will be changed to give a unique challenge each time you play the same level.
The game randomly generates for you a First Aid pack which heals you immediately, and bullets pack which gives 3 bullets, but the chance to get them is not that high.

This game is all about patience and good tactics.
